projects.title: Colors!
projects.author: Vishesh Gupta
projects.description: A project exploring some colors found in a color thesaurus.

posts.title: About the Dataset
posts.author: Vishesh Gupta
posts.summary: Check out this data set of color values taken from an author's color thesarus. The main takeaways - how do you group colors? How do you determine if there are missing/superfluous colors in the data set?

posts.title: Color Spaces
posts.author: Vishesh Gupta
posts.summary: Colors can be understood in many different forms and various spaces have been invented over the years to show the 'natural perception' of colors by the human eye. Here is a discussion of various color spaces and why I chose CIELAB as the main space to work in (and CIELUV for aggregation, but we'll get to that later).

projects.title: Stanford Majors
projects.author: Vishesh Gupta
projects.description: Which majors are popular at Stanford by gender?

posts.title: Majors Datasetup
posts.author: Vishesh Gupta
posts.summary: From Stanford's registrar's office - my first mini data project. The main interesting things here would be to look at the changes in major selection over time, and the differences in majors by gender. I'm mostly interested in the undergrad majors.
